verses.verse: And the men <S%H376><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> gathered themselves together, <S%H6817><s%> and went <S%H5674><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> Wherefore <S%H4069><s%> passedst thou over <S%H5674><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and didst not <S%H3808><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> us to go <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee? we will burn <S%H8313><s%> thine house <S%H1004><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, I <S%H589><s%> and my people <S%H5971><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> at great strife <S%H376><s%> <S%H7379><s%> <S%H3966><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%> and when I called <S%H2199><s%> you, ye delivered <S%H3467><s%> me not <S%H3808><s%> out of their hands. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%>

And when I saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye delivered <S%H3467><s%> me not, <S%H369><s%> I put <S%H7760><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> in my hands, <S%H3709><s%> and passed over <S%H5674><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into my hand: <S%H3027><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then are ye come up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against me?

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> gathered together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> Gileadites <S%H1568><s%> are fugitives <S%H6412><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the Ephraimites, <S%H669><s%> and among <S%H8432><s%> the Manassites. <S%H4519><s%>

And the Gileadites <S%H1568><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H853><s%> the passages <S%H4569><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before the Ephraimites: <S%H669><s%> and it was <S%H1961><s%> so, that when <S%H3588><s%> those Ephraimites <S%H669><s%> which were escaped <S%H6412><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let me go over; <S%H5674><s%> that the men <S%H376><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Art thou <S%H859><s%> an Ephraimite? <S%H673><s%> If he said, <S%H559><s%> Nay; <S%H3808><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> they unto him, Say <S%H559><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> Shibboleth: <S%H7641><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> Sibboleth: <S%H5451><s%> for he could not <S%H3808><s%> frame <S%H3559><s%> to pronounce <S%H1696><s%> it right. <S%H3651><s%> Then they took <S%H270><s%> him, and slew <S%H7819><s%> him at <S%H413><s%> the passages <S%H4569><s%> of Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> and there fell <S%H5307><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> of the Ephraimites <S%H4480><s%> <S%H669><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%> Then died <S%H4191><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite, <S%H1569><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in one of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
And after <S%H310><s%> him Ibzan <S%H78><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he had <S%H1961><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> whom he sent <S%H7971><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> and took in <S%H935><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%> for his sons. <S%H1121><s%> And he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Then died <S%H4191><s%> Ibzan, <S%H78><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> at Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> him Elon, <S%H356><s%> a Zebulonite, <S%H2075><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
And Elon <S%H356><s%> the Zebulonite <S%H2075><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Aijalon <S%H357><s%> in the country <S%H776><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2075><s%>
And after <S%H310><s%> him Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel, <S%H1985><s%> a Pirathonite, <S%H6553><s%> judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he had <S%H1961><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> nephews, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1121><s%> that rode <S%H7392><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> ass colts: <S%H5895><s%> and he judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And Abdon <S%H5658><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hillel <S%H1985><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Pirathon <S%H6552><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the Amalekites. <S%H6003><s%>
